item.title: COTY
item.description: score:12 Chances: Coty successfully completes refinancing of its revolving credit facility, signaling financial stability. Coty focuses on boosting its global presence and ups its FY23 view, indicating growth prospects. Marc Jacobs and Coty expand their license partnership to beauty, potentially driving brand sales.
